thread.title: Kristen Wilk
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Kristen Wilk

author: Kristen Wilk
title: Kristen Wilk
text: We used Robin Sabine with Costa Rican Vacations to book our family trip to Costa Rica last February. The trip was a huge success! One of our best family trips ever. We have 3 kids, ages 9-15. It can be difficult to find the right excursions and accommodations to fit all of our needs. Robin, was so helpful with all of this and had fabulous suggestions. We were so pleased, we are using Robin again for our trip to Panama this spring. I give her and Costa Rican Vacations my highest recommendation.
